DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test whether replace dietary carbohydrate protein , use beef primarily source protein , improve risk factor cardiovascular disease .
DOC.brief_title: Lipoprotein Effects Substituting Beef Protein Carbohydrate
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim study test hypothesis replace dietary carbohydrate protein , use beef primarily source protein , beneficial effect component atherogenic dyslipidemia postprandial lipoprotein response effect independent saturate fat intake .
DOC.criteria: Blood pressure le 150/90 Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 20 ≤ 35 kg/m2 Nonsmoker Agrees consume alcohol study Agrees abstain take dietary supplement study LDLcholesterol total cholesterol < 95th percentile age sex Fasting triglycerides < 500 mg/dL Fasting glucose concentration < 126 mg/dL Hematocrit ( HCT ) ≥ 36 % At least three month weightstable state ( ± 3 % body weight ) Personal history coronary heart disease , cerebrovascular disease , peripheral vascular disease , diabetes , lung disease , bleed disorder , liver renal disease , HIV cancer ( skin cancer ) last five year Taking drug know affect lipid metabolism insulin resistance , hormone , blood thin agent warfarin Abnormal thyroid stimulate hormone ( TSH ) Strength train resistance weight four hour per week
